# Xml Docs

## Access XML data using XPathNavigator

- [Access XML data using XPathNavigator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/accessing-xml-data-using-xpathnavigator.md): Learn more about: Accessing XML Data using XPathNavigator
- [Node set navigation using XPathNavigator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/node-set-navigation-using-xpathnavigator.md): Learn more about: Node Set Navigation Using XPathNavigator
- [Attribute and namespace node navigation Using XPathNavigator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/attribute-and-namespace-node-navigation-using-xpathnavigator.md): Learn more about: Attribute and Namespace Node Navigation Using XPathNavigator
- [Extract XML data Using XPathNavigator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/extract-xml-data-using-xpathnavigator.md): Learn more about: Extract XML Data Using XPathNavigator
- [Access strongly typed XML data Using XPathNavigator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/accessing-strongly-typed-xml-data-using-xpathnavigator.md): Learn more about: Accessing Strongly Typed XML Data Using XPathNavigator
- [User-defined functions and variables](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md): Learn more about: User Defined Functions and Variables

## Convert XML Data Types

- [Convert XML Data Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/conversion-of-xml-data-types.md): Learn more about: Conversion of XML Data Types
- [Convert Strings to .NET Framework Data Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/converting-strings-to-dotnet-data-types.md): Learn more about: Convert strings to .NET data types
- [Convert .NET Framework Types to Strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/converting-dotnet-types-to-strings.md): Learn more about: Convert .NET types to strings

## Create new nodes

- [Create new nodes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/create-new-nodes-in-the-dom.md): Learn more about: Create New Nodes in the DOM
- [Create new attributes for elements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/creating-new-attributes-for-elements-in-the-dom.md): Learn more about: Creating New Attributes for Elements in the DOM
- [Verify XML element and attribute names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-element-and-attribute-name-verification-when-creating-new-nodes.md): Learn more about: XML Element and Attribute Name Verification when Creating New Nodes
- [Create new entity references](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/creating-new-entity-references.md): Learn more about: Creating New Entity References
- [Entity reference expansion for new nodes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/namespace-affect-on-entity-ref-expansion-for-new-nodes.md): Learn more about: Namespace Affect on Entity Reference Expansion for New Nodes Containing Elements and Attributes
